subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Oscar De La Hoya finally has an opponent for his farewell fight, only his matchup with Manny Pacquiao may not be his final bout after all. De La Hoya and Pacquiao have confirmed their plan to meet Dec. 6 in Las Vegas.
snippet: Oscar De La Hoya finally has an opponent for his farewell fight, only his matchup with Manny Pacquiao may not be his final bout after all. De La Hoya and Pacquiao have confirmed their plan to meet Dec. 6 in Las Vegas.
